message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 400k, it's a generous offer!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I still want a bigger share!
You can have 300k, but don't expect any more generosity!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not getting any younger!
You can have 200k, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm not going to give up yet! Let's try to find a better deal!
